mapper.sql: cmmdty_id, category, cmmdty_name, cmmdty_num, cmmdty_desc, num_stored, num_sales, num_evaluated, num_enquired, proposed_price, current_price, shelves_time, unshelves_time, default_image_addrs, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into pending_boutique( cmmdty_id, category, cmmdty_name, cmmdty_num, cmmdty_desc, num_stored, num_sales, num_evaluated, num_enquired, proposed_price, current_price, shelves_time, unshelves_time, default_image_addrs, create_time, update_time ) values ( #{cmmdtyId, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{category, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cmmdtyName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cmmdtyNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cmmdtyDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numStored, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numSales, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numEvaluated, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numEnquired, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{proposedPrice, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{currentPrice, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shelvesTime, jdbcType=DATE}, #{unshelvesTime, jdbcType=DATE}, #{defaultImageAddrs, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update:
update pending_boutique set
category = #{category, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cmmdty_name = #{cmmdtyName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cmmdty_num = #{cmmdtyNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cmmdty_desc = #{cmmdtyDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
num_stored = #{numStored, jdbcType=INTEGER},
num_sales = #{numSales, jdbcType=INTEGER},
num_evaluated = #{numEvaluated, jdbcType=INTEGER},
num_enquired = #{numEnquired, jdbcType=INTEGER},
proposed_price = #{proposedPrice, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
current_price = #{currentPrice, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
shelves_time = #{shelvesTime, jdbcType=DATE},
unshelves_time = #{unshelvesTime, jdbcType=DATE},
default_image_addrs = #{defaultImageAddrs, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where cmmdty_id = #{cmmdtyId, jdbcType=DECIMAL}
